messages.title: HONESTY IN POLITICS
messages.content: We were all appalled by the behaviour of some Westminster MPs exposed last year. Their abuse of the expenses system not only brought shame on those directly involved but plunged the whole political process into disrepute.

messages.title: HONESTY IN POLITICS
messages.content: What we want are politicians who are honest, hard-working and speak up to defend our interests at Westminster. Scotland needs champions.

mentions.candidate: Angus has been fortunate over these past few years to have, in Mike Weir, someone who possesses all of these qualities and more.

images.caption: Promoted and published by Graeme Dey on behalf of Mike Weir both of 14 Brothock Bridge Arbroath. Printed by Fairprint Dundee
